citations.narrative:
The most recent physical exams documented for the wolf dogs were August 8 & 9, 2022. Every dog must have a
complete physical exam from head to tail by the attending veterinarian not less than once every 12 months in order to
ensure the health and welfare of the dogs.
Correct by 20 July, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

narrative:
3.13(a)(2) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The most recent physical exams documented for the wolf dogs were August 8 & 9, 2022. Every dog must have a 
complete physical exam from head to tail by the attending veterinarian not less than once every 12 months in order to 
ensure the health and welfare of the dogs. 
 
Correct by 20 July, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
